actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the District of Columbia government from entering into Sister City relationships with jurisdictions located in foreign adversary countries and for other purposes.
